name: Senate Finance
html_pattern: table.table-striped > tr with td cells: [td.recordListTitle > a (title+link), td (location), td (date+time)]. Table header row: 'Upcoming Hearings'. Grouped by month with sub-headers.
testimony_format: Download links at /download/{filename} paths (not .pdf extension, but PDF content)
notes: Classic Drupal-style CMS. Table-based listing with 26+ rows. Testimony as 'Download Statement'/'Download Testimony' links. Video in div.video-container with senate.gov ISVP iframe. Witness names appear with testimony links.

name: Senate Banking
html_pattern: table.table-striped > tr with td cells: [td.recordListTitle > a (type:title+link), td (location), td (date+time)]. Grouped by month.
notes: Classic Drupal-style CMS. Table-based listing with 25+ rows. Title includes type prefix ('Full Committee Hearing:' or 'Subcommittee Hearing:'). Future hearings have date in URL path; past hearings have slug-only URL.

name: Senate Budget
html_pattern: table.table-striped > tr with td cells: [td.recordListTitle > a (title+link), td (location), td (date)]. Grouped by Congress session.
notes: Classic Drupal-style CMS. Table-based listing with 25+ rows. Uses unusual MM.DD.YY date format. Grouped by Congress (e.g., '119th Congress (2025-2026)').

name: Senate Commerce
html_pattern: Drupal-based. Hearing entries in <main> with links matching /YYYY/M/{title-slug} pattern. Listing is announcement-style with embedded dates.
notes: Drupal-based with announcement-style hearing pages. Testimony downloads use GUID-based file paths via /services/files/. Witness names visible alongside testimony download links. Robust testimony/video availability.

name: Senate Appropriations
html_pattern: table.table-striped > tr with td cells: [td.recordListTitle > a (type:title+link), td (location), td (date+time)]. 'Upcoming Hearings' header.
testimony_format: Not found on checked detail page (may appear after hearing occurs)
video_format: div.video-container present but iframe may load dynamically
notes: Classic Drupal-style CMS. Table-based listing with 27+ rows. Title includes type prefix ('Subcommittee Hearing:'). Video container div present but iframe was empty on checked page (future hearing). Testimony and witnesses likely appear post-hearing.

name: Senate Foreign Relations
html_pattern: New Senate CMS (SiteHeader-based). Hearing entries as links in body with /hearings/{title-slug} pattern. Date embedded in link text context.
video_format: senate.gov/isvp iframe embed (comm=foreign) in div.js-hearing-video / div.Hearing__videoContainer
notes: New Senate CMS. Has separate hearing transcript archive at /activities-and-reports/hearing-transcripts. 21+ hearing links found in body. Detail pages have structured testimony downloads, video embeds, and witness sections.

name: Senate HELP
html_pattern: New Senate CMS (SiteHeader-based). Hearing entries as links in body with /hearings/{title-slug} pattern.
date_format: MM.DD.YY (in table cells) and contextual dates
testimony_format: Not found on checked page (may appear after testimony is submitted)
notes: New Senate CMS. 18+ hearing links found. Detail pages have video embeds via senate.gov ISVP. Testimony links not found on checked page - may be added post-hearing or hosted separately.

name: Senate Intelligence
html_pattern: WordPress blog. <article> elements with class 'et_pb_post'. Title in <h2> > <a>. Date in article text. Redirects to /hearings-meetings/.
testimony_format: PDF files at /wp-content/uploads/YYYY/MM/{filename}.pdf (Opening Statements, Questionnaire responses, QFR)
notes: WordPress site with Divi theme. 19+ articles found. Hearing entries mixed with legislation posts. Date in WordPress-style URL path. PDFs hosted in wp-content/uploads/. Has category-based filtering (/category/hearings/). Robust testimony PDF availability including opening statements, questionnaires, and questions for the record.

name: Senate HSGAC
html_pattern: WordPress + Elementor + JetEngine. div.jet-listing-grid with jet-listing-grid__item children. Each item contains date, title link, time, location.
date_format: MM/DD/YYYY (in page) and 'Feb DD' short format in grid items
testimony_format: Not found - detail page content may require JS/Elementor rendering for full content
video_format: div.video-column (Elementor) present but iframe not rendered in static HTML
notes: WordPress + Elementor + JetEngine site. Hearing listing is partially in HTML via JetEngine grid. Detail pages have Elementor-based layout where video and testimony sections may require JS to fully render. Redirects /hearings to /hearings/. Subcommittee hearings use different URL path. 35+ items visible in listing.

name: Senate EPW
html_pattern: ColdFusion CMS. table.table.recordList > tr > [td.recordListTitle > a (title+link), td (type), td (location), td (date+time)]. Multiple tables grouped by month in div.recordsContainer.
testimony_format: Witness testimony PDFs at /public/?a=Files.Serve&File_id={GUID}. Witness statement pages at /public/index.cfm/hearings?Id={hearingGUID}&Statement_id={GUID}
notes: ColdFusion CMS. IMPORTANT: Base URL /hearings redirects to 404; correct URL is /public/index.cfm/hearings. Table.recordList with 4 columns (Hearing, Type, Location, Date). Grouped monthly. Has month/year filter. Detail pages have structured witness panels with testimony PDFs and statement sub-pages. Has /public/index.cfm/committee-transcripts page.

name: Senate Judiciary
html_pattern: New Senate CMS (SiteHeader-based). Redirects to /committee-activity/hearings. Hearing entries as links in body with /committee-activity/hearings/{title-slug} pattern.
testimony_format: Not found on checked detail page
notes: New Senate CMS. Redirects /hearings to /committee-activity/hearings. 18+ hearing links found. Detail pages have video but testimony downloads were not found on checked page. Some hearings have date suffix in slug (e.g., -02-12-2026).

name: Senate Armed Services
html_pattern: New Senate CMS (SiteHeader-based). Hearing entries as links in body with /hearings/{title-slug} pattern. Also has /hearings/witnesses directory.
testimony_format: Not found on checked detail page
notes: New Senate CMS. 21+ hearing links found. Has dedicated witness directory page. Detail pages have video embeds but no testimony downloads found. Hearing titles follow 'To receive testimony on...' pattern typical of Armed Services.

name: Senate Agriculture
html_pattern: New Senate CMS (SiteHeader-based). Hearing entries as links in body with /hearings/{title-slug} pattern. Has transcript archive and witness directory.
testimony_format: Not found on checked detail page
notes: New Senate CMS. 22+ hearing links found. Has /library/hearing-transcripts archive page and /hearings/witnesses directory. Detail pages have video embeds. Testimony downloads not found on checked page.

name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
html_pattern: Drupal-based. Hearing entries in <main> with links in /hearings/YYYY/M/{title-slug} format. 97+ hearing links found.
date_format: Mon DD (in listing) with YYYY-MM-DD in URL
testimony_format: Links with 'testimony' in text pointing to hearing detail pages
video_format: senate.gov/isvp iframe embed (comm=energy) in div.hearing-webcast. Also has /live-webcast page.
notes: Drupal-based CMS. Very rich listing with 97+ entries visible in raw HTML. Date encoded in URL path. Has live webcast page. Detail pages have video iframe embeds and witness information.

name: Senate Veterans Affairs
html_pattern: Drupal-based. Hearing entries in <main> with links in /YYYY/MM/{title-slug} format. Limited entries visible (3 on page).
date_format: Mon DD (in listing) with YYYY-MM-DD in URL
notes: Drupal-based CMS. Only 3 hearing entries visible on listing page (may need pagination or year filter). Detail pages have testimony downloads (as 'Download File'), video iframe embeds, and witness sections. Has /hearings2 and /committee-transcripts pages.

name: Senate Small Business
html_pattern: ColdFusion CMS. table.table.recordList > tr > [td (date), td (time), td.recordListTitle > a (title+link)]. Multiple tables grouped by month in div.recordsContainer.
testimony_format: Witness testimony PDFs at /public/?a=Files.Serve&File_id={GUID}. Witness statement pages at /public/index.cfm/hearings?Id={hearingGUID}&Statement_id={GUID}
notes: ColdFusion CMS. IMPORTANT: Base URL /hearings redirects to 404; correct URL is /public/index.cfm/hearings. Table.recordList with 3 columns (Date, Time, Title). Grouped monthly. Detail pages have structured 'Witness Panel 1/2' sections with testimony PDFs via Files.Serve endpoint. 10+ hearings per congress.

name: Senate Indian Affairs
html_pattern: WordPress + Elementor + JetEngine. div.jet-listing-grid with jet-listing-grid__item children. Items contain date, title, time, location.
testimony_format: Not found - Elementor-based detail page; testimony may require JS rendering
video_format: Video column (Elementor widget) present but no iframe in static HTML; YouTube channel at youtube.com/user/SenateIndianAffairs
notes: WordPress + Elementor + JetEngine site. Redirects /hearings to /hearings/. Hearing listing via JetEngine grid (partially rendered in HTML). Detail pages use Elementor widgets where video/testimony sections may require JS. YouTube channel linked for video archives. Limited hearings visible in listing.

name: Senate Rules and Administration
html_pattern: New Senate CMS (SiteHeader-based). Redirects to /hearings/list. Hearing entries as links with /hearings/{title-slug} pattern.
testimony_format: Not found on checked detail page
notes: New Senate CMS. Redirects /hearings to /hearings/list. 20+ hearing links found. Detail pages have video embeds. Many entries are business meetings. Some hearings have date suffix in slug.
